resources.string: {\"title\": \"First Linear Quiz\", \"type\": \"linear quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"How many languages and dialects are spoken by people all over the world?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 6000, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 9000, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 4000, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 1000, \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Approximately, how many people speak Chinese language?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"1 billion\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"1 million\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"1 lakh\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"1 thousand\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"The language with the richest vocabulary is: \", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Hindi\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"French\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"English\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"German\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"The oldest Indian language is:\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Telugu\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Hindu\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Tamil\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Punjabi\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Which book has been printed in the maximum number of languages and these scripts? \", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"The Bible\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Hiraka Sutra\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"The Super Book\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"None of the above\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Who developed the small pox vaccination?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Eduard Jenner\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Alexander Fleming\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Albert Einstein\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"None of the above\", \"score\": 0}]}]}

{\"title\": \"First Linear Quiz\", \"type\": \"linear quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"What is the answer to 1+1?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 2, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 3, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 4, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 5, \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"What is the answer to 2+2?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 2, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 3, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 4, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 5, \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"How spicy is spicy?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"very spicy\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"somewhat spicy\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"little spicy\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"not spicy at all\", \"score\": 0}]}]}

{\"title\": \"First Personality Quiz\", \"type\": \"personality quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"What is your favorite color?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"blue\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"red\", \"score\": [0, 0, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"yellow\", \"score\": [0, 1, 0, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"green\", \"score\": [0, 1, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"What is your favorite drink?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Coke\", \"score\": [-1, -1, -1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"Water\", \"score\": [-1, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"Orange Juice\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 0]}, {\"answer\": \"Tap Water\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"What is your favorite fruit?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Orange\", \"score\": [0, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"Apple\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"Banana\", \"score\": [-1, -1, 1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"Watermelon\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"When do you usually wake up?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Before 7am\", \"score\": [0, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"7am - 9am\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"9am - 11am\", \"score\": [-1, -1, 1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"After 11am\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"When do you usually sleep?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Before 7pm\", \"score\": [0, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"7pm - 9pm\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"9pm - 11pm\", \"score\": [-1, -1, 1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"After 11pm\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"Do you like math over history?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"I like math\", \"score\": [0, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"I love history\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"I like both\", \"score\": [-1, -1, 1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"I like neither\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 1]}]}], \"interpretation\": [[\"Mad\", \"Not Mad\"], [\"Smart\", \"Not Smart\"], [\"Fun\", \"Not Fun\"], [\"Lazy\", \"Not Lazy\"]]}

{\"title\": \"Second Linear Quiz\", \"type\": \"linear quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"The national sport of Canada is:\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Tennis and cricket\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Lacrosse\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Judo\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Rugby and Football\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Badminton is the national sport of:\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Malaysia\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Scotland\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"China\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Former soviet Union\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Where is the Vallabhbhai Patel stadium located? \", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Kolkata\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Mumbai\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Chennai\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Delhi\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Where is the sports stadium, Green Park, located?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Kanpur\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Jamshedpur\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Cuttack\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Patiala\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Arena is the special name for playground of\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Cricket\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Lawn Tennis\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Wrestling\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Skating\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"Who was first to sail sound the strait, reached the Philippines and named the Pacific Ocean?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Ferdinand Magelion\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"Jacques Carter\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"William Janszoom\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Vasco da Gama\", \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, awarded the Noble Prize in:\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Physics\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Economics\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Chemistry\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"(a) and (c)\", \"score\": 1}]}, {\"query\": \"Who located the magnetic pole?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Sir James Clark\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Rear Admiral\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"Sir John Ross\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"All the above\", \"score\": 1}]}]}
